tool_description: Generates alerts and notifications based on sentiment analysis results when satisfaction levels cross defined thresholds.

alert_thresholds.description: Alert threshold values for different severity levels

alert_type.description: Type of alert: immediate, daily_summary, or weekly_summary

error_messages: Invalid sentiment score: Score must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Invalid alert thresholds: All thresholds must be between 0.0 and 1.0.
Threshold ordering error: Thresholds should be in ascending or descending order.
usage: Input current sentiment score and define alert thresholds. Optionally specify customer ID and alert type. Returns alert status and recommendations.

alert_level.description: Severity level of the alert (low, medium, high, critical)

recommended_action.description: Suggested action to address the alert
